text.text_translated:
I am in a group called the 'Campaign to Stop Killer Robots'. We want to stop robots that kill.

Killer robots are not like in the movies. They are not scary robots from a film. But they are real now. Soldiers use machines like drones, gun turrets, and sentry robots. These machines kill people. A person gives very little help.

Soon, there will be robots that kill on their own. They will follow orders. But they will decide who to kill.

I think this is completely wrong. It is very dangerous for all people. We need to be very careful. We must think about what we ask machines to do.
